title: Internals pattern
content: Right now am in sem 2 chem cycle so I wanna ask to people who studied chem cycle in sem 1 that how was the isas paper pattern for statics,chem,epd?

comments.body:
the statics paper will have some questions relating to mechanical statics

epd paper is mostly about electronic principles and devices

and the chem paper has a lot of chemistry in it, molecules at wotnot

on a more serious Note, almost all questions in statics paper are from textbook, epd just grind out the slides, chem idk i fucked chem badly
its the same as what u had for phy cycle mechanical, EEE and phy respectively
same as first sem papers, no change, 24m mcq, 16m written for isa
